issue.title: allow user to set startup sim-time when starting gazebo paused

content.raw:
Since on real robots, one almost never have to deal with wall time of 0 since 1970 :)  How about an optional command line argument at start-up to specify starting sim time? e.g.
~~~
gazebo --start-sim-time 1354901575
~~~
This way people trying to use simulation as real robot replacement can get time behavior closer to the real robot?
